source_sentence: 我由染欲深過患　　墮於無間地獄中
translation: As a result of being deeply addicted to desire, I will fall into the hell of unremitting suffering

source_sentence: 蒙佛恩力得生天　　復令證得涅盤道
translation: Through the power of the Buddha, they will be reborn in heaven and realize the path of liberation.

source_sentence: 我由依止淨法眼　　永脫輪迴諸惡趣
translation: Through relying on the pure Dharma eye, I am permanently liberated from the evil destinies of transmigration.

source_sentence: 及彼未來生死流　　得至寂靜菩提岸
translation: and their future stream of birth-and-death will reach the shore of tranquil enlightenment

source_sentence: 我今得見牟尼主　　百千生中難值遇
善超生老病苦因　　應受世間廣供養
translation: He is skilled in transcending the causes of birth, old age, sickness, and suffering; he should be revered throughout the world.

source_sentence: 持寶瓔珞以奉獻　　合掌右繞心忻慶
translation: He held a jeweled necklace in his hand and offered it to the Licchavi Vimalakīrti, joining his palms.

source_sentence: 故我頂禮二足尊　　能使人天生覺悟
translation: For this reason, I bow my head in homage to the two-legged holy one and allow them to awaken.
